    • Controller

      public Controller​(Runner run, java.lang.Thread thread, int id, int level)
      Constructor. get the main Runner, and the thread performs it.
      Parameters:
      run - the main Runner of the game
      thread - the executor Tread
      id - user's id to login
      level - one of the scenario games

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Action Performed. handle about all action performed in GameGUI, and Panel. Possible actions: 1. mute / un-mute music 2. submit the entry id and level 3. choose level from menu.
